dc:title: Called To Be Saints
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Emphasizes the need to strive for holiness. Lists the various retreats offered on the farm and notes secular writers and books with the same message. Quotes St. Thomas who describes holiness as "the end to which one must tend."
